mapper.select: select DISTINCT Maker from CAR_MAKER where Maker in ('현대','기아','삼성','쌍용')
select DISTINCT Maker from CAR_MAKER where Maker not in ('현대','기아','삼성','쌍용')

SELECT cma.maker, cma.model, cmo.car_year, cmo.price, cmo.cc, cmo.car_img, cmo.input_date
FROM CAR_MAKER cma, CAR_MODEL cmo
where cmo.model=cma.model and cmo.model=#{model} order by cmo.input_date desc
